organic.title: Elden Ring – Patch Notes Version 1.14 - Bandai Namco

organic.title: Combat or Stealth? Play Unknown 9: Awakening Your Way
organic.snippet: If you ever find yourself outnumbered and there's no exit in sight, consider unleashing a Heavy Umbric Attack. This power move increases your enemies' Fazed state. Once their Faze gauges are full, they become staggered, immobile, and especially vulnerable to attacks.
